title: Editor Fears Paris Attack Will Fuel Extremism On The Far Right
teaser: France is reeling from attacks by Islamist extremists this week. NPR's Scott Simon talks to Natalie Nougayr√®de, former executive editor of Le Monde, about the future of French media and culture.
